snippet: Israel plans to allow building materials meant for private projects into the Gaza Strip for the first time in six years, an Israeli defense official said Tuesday.
abstract: Israel plans to allow building materials meant for private projects into Gaza Strip for first time in six years; Gaza has been struggling with shortage of building materials that has worsened since July.
lead_paragraph: Israel plans to allow building materials meant for private projects into the Gaza Strip for the first time in six years, an Israeli defense official said Tuesday.

headline.main: Israel Plans to Ease Gaza Blockade
headline.print_headline: Israel Plans to Ease Gaza Blockade
